document_data.name: Maeral
document_data.mainbody: '''Maeral''' was a figure known to [[elves]] as of the 3{{rd}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Legacy: Maeral's dream was discussed by [[Eltargrim]] and Lady [[Starym]] in {{yearlink|241}} prior to her assassination attempt on him. Eltargrim spoke well of it, while Lady [[Ildilyntra Starym]] thought it a madness born of the grip of elder years.
